column1: Title: "Network meta-analysis on the effects of finerenone versus SGLT2 inhibitors and GLP-1 receptor agonists on cardiovascular and renal outcomes in patients with type 2 diabetes mellitus and chronic kidney disease"
SAMPLE_SIZE: NR (network meta-analysis of multiple RCTs)
FOLLOW_UP_MONTHS: Varied (12-60 months across included studies)
EXTRACTION_UNCERTAINTIES: "Limited baseline characteristics reported in NMA"
EXTRACTION_NOTES: "Key NMA providing direct comparison data for SGLT2i vs GLP-1RA vs finerenone in T2DM+CKD population"

TITLE: Network meta-analysis on the effects of finerenone versus SGLT2 inhibitors and GLP-1 receptor agonists on cardiovascular and renal outcomes in patients with type 2 diabetes mellitus and chronic kidney disease
